item.title: Belgium will ban sales of disposable e-cigarettes in a first for the EU
item.description: The ban, which will take effect on Jan. 1, is based on health and environmental grounds and is a groundbreaking move for European Union nations.

item.title: Plane crashes and bursts into flames at an airport in South Korea, killing at least 127

item.title: WHO chief recounts narrow escape at Yemen airport hit by Israeli missile

item.title: Magnus Carlsen quits chess championship after refusing to change out of jeans
item.description: The Norwegian chess grandmaster was fined $200 and given a warning by the International Chess Federation (FIDE) to change into acceptable attire or be...

item.title: Big Lots reaches deal to keep hundreds of U.S. stores open
item.description: Big Lots said Friday it will be sold to Gordon Brothers Retail Partners, a firm that specializes in distressed companies.
